data.title: Traveling
data.solution:
<?php
/**
 * Enjoy the Trip
 **/

fscanf(STDIN, "%s", $homeCountry);
fscanf(STDIN, "%d", $budget);
fscanf(STDIN, "%d", $N);
$list = [];

for ($i = 0; $i < $N; $i++)
{
    fscanf(STDIN, "%s %d", $country, $ticketCost);
    $list[$country] = $ticketCost;
}
arsort($list);

$last_visited = null;
$temp_list = $list;
foreach($temp_list as $key => $value) {
    if($budget < $value) break;
    array_shift($list);
    $last_visited = $key;
    $budget -= $value;
}

$ticketHome = floor(array_sum($temp_list)/count($temp_list));
$budget -= $ticketHome;

if(sizeof($list) > 0 || $budget < 0) {
    $output = "BOOHISS";
    $amount = abs(array_sum($list) - $budget);
    $output2 = $last_visited . " " . $amount;
} else {
    $output = "YAY";
    $output2 = $budget;
}

// Write an answer using echo(). DON'T FORGET THE TRAILING \n
// To debug: error_log(var_export($var, true)); (equivalent to var_dump)

echo("$output\n");
echo("$output2\n");
?>
data.statement:
A man from [[homeCountry]] have a list of [[countries]] he wants to visits. He has a [[budget]] for the trip and he only has to worry about ticket costs.

The goal is to know if the man can visit all the countries in his list.
Output {{YAY}} if he can, followed by his budget surplus.
If he can't, output {{BOOHISS}} followed by a line with the country he is stuck in and the amount he needs to complete his trip.

<<Notes :>> 
• He has to come back to his [[homeCountry]]. The price of ticket to his home country is the average of all the costs in his list rounded down.
• He will visit the countries with the higher costs first.

data.stubGenerator:
read homeCountry:word(256)
read budget:int
read N:int
loop N read country:word(256) ticketCost:int
write YAY
0

STATEMENT
Enjoy the Trip
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> A String [[homeCountry]].
<<Line 2 :>> An integer [[budget]].
<<Line 3 :>> An integer [[N]] for the number of countries in the list.
<<Next [[N]] Lines :>> A String [[country]] and an integer [[ticketCost]].
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> {{YAY}} if every country on the list was visited. {{BOOHISS}} if not.
<<Line 2 :>> 
An integer [[S]]: of the Budget surplus, if {{YAY}}.
Or
Two space separated values, [[C]]: country where the traveler is stuck and [[M]]: Amount needed to complete the trip, if {{BOOHISS}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A man from homeCountry have a list of countries he wants to visits. He has a budget for the trip and he only has to worry about ticket costs.

The goal is to know if the man can visit all the countries in his list.
Output YAY if he can, followed by his budget surplus.
If he can't, output BOOHISS followed by a line with the country he is stuck in and the amount he needs to complete his trip.

Notes :
• He has to come back to his homeCountry. The price of ticket to his home country is the average of all the costs in his list rounded down.
• He will visit the countries with the higher costs first.
Input
Line 1 : A String homeCountry.
Line 2 : An integer budget.
Line 3 : An integer N for the number of countries in the list.
Next N Lines : A String country and an integer ticketCost.
Output
Line 1 : YAY if every country on the list was visited. BOOHISS if not.
Line 2 :
An integer S: of the Budget surplus, if YAY.
Or
Two space separated values, C: country where the traveler is stuck and M: Amount needed to complete the trip, if BOOHISS.
Constraints
Example
Input
Madagasikara
1000
4
Tanzania 159
Uganda 215
Ethiopia 126
Kenya 151
Output
YAY
187
